duties_responsibilities.duty: Teach graduate and/or undergraduate nursing students through didactic instruction either online or in a blended format.
Mentor nursing students and engage in college, university, community, and professional service activities.
Conduct clinical site visits and instruct students in hospital and clinical settings.
Perform simulation and lab activities aligned with professional nursing expertise and skills.
Serve on college committees and perform community and professional service activities where appropriate.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree in an appropriate field of specialization, or equivalent qualifications based on professional experience.
Eligibility to practice and maintain licensure as an RN and/or APRN in the state of Florida.
